= Determining Server Capabilities =

Calling [http://jscep.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/documentation/com/google/code/jscep/client/Client.html#getCaCapabilities() getCaCapabilities()] on the [http://jscep.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/documentation/com/google/code/jscep/client/Client.html Client] will yield a new [http://jscep.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/documentation/com/google/code/jscep/response/Capabilities.html Capabilities] instance, which provides information on the configuration of the SCEP server.  The available information includes:

  * Support for retrieval of a "rollover" CA certificate, if it exists.
  * Support for sending SCEP operations using HTTP POST
  * Support for renewing certificates
  * Support for the SHA-1, SHA-256 and SHA-256 hash algorithms.
  * Support for Triple-DES encryption.

{{{
client.getCaCapabilities();
}}}

= Retrieve CA Certificate =

{{{
client.getCaCertificate();
}}}

= Retrieve Rollover CA Certificate =

{{{
client.getNextCaCertificate();
}}}
